SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
A_Star
Implements the A* search algorithm to find the shortest path in a maze.
Block
Represents a single block within a maze in a maze runner game.
BlockType
Enum representing the different types of blocks in a maze runner game.
BoundingBox
Represents an axis-aligned bounding box with a position and size.
Bullet
Represents a bullet, which is a projectile that the player can shoot in the game.
Camera
This class represents a camera that follows a target in the game world.
DesktopLauncher
The DesktopLauncher class is the entry point for the desktop version of the Maze Runner game.
Enemy
Represents an enemy in the game, extending the GameEntities class.
GameEntities
This is the superclass for all entities in the game.
GameOverScreen
The screen displayed when the game is over.
GameScreen
The `GameScreen` class is responsible for rendering the gameplay screen.
Ghost1
Represents a Ghost enemy in the game, extending the Enemy class.
Ghost2
Represents a Ghost2 enemy in the game, extending the Enemy class.
Key
Represents a Key in the game, extending the GameEntities class.
Manager
This class serves as a singleton manager for various utility classes in the game, such as the SoundManager.
Maps
Represents the game map in a maze runner game.
MazeRunnerGame
The `MazeRunnerGame` class represents the core of the Maze Runner game.
MenuScreen
The `MenuScreen` class is responsible for displaying the main menu of the game.
Node
Represents a node in a grid-based map for pathfinding.
Player
Represents the player in a maze runner game.
SoundManager
This class manages the sounds for a game.
SpriteSheet
This class represents a sprite sheet, which is a collection of smaller images, or "frames", stored in a larger image, or "texture".
Traps
Represents a trap in a maze runner game.
WinScreen
This class represents the victory screen for the MazeRunner game.
